title: Bloomberg Markets: Market Drivers, Eco Brief for July 7
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Market Drivers, Eco Brief for July 7
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Yelena Shulyatyeva Senior U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Markets Reporter Dani Burger, who also talks about her story "Cross-Asset Quants Bitten by Fed Facing Worst Losses in a Decade."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
